scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.test: npm run test -w client && npm run test -w server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w client && npm install -w server
scripts.env:reset:mac: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json client/node_modules client/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.env:reset:win: rd /s /q node_modules & del package-lock.json & rd /s /q client\node_modules & del client\package-lock.json & rd /s /q server\node_modules & del server\package-lock.json && npm install
